name: BOMŽPAKI FACTORY: THE OTHER
description:
Your a diffrent contract killer to kill elvinas who is in the bomzpaki factory.

tutorial:

wsad to walk

space to jump

shift to run

mouse1 to shoot

mouse2 to shoot other gun

very basic stuff. 

only true gamers can beat this game in one run. send video proof or stream gameplay on discord Pirozkhi#3506. thanks

enjoy.

PRESS THE RED BUTTON TO START (press on corner)
